allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor for NY State AI Hackathon \(Jan 13-14, 2026\)

- Update branding from NYC to NY State AI Hackathon for Public Sector
- Add compliance sections for LOADinG Act, RAISE Act, and GCC
- Rename Virtual-Citizen-Assistant to Constituent-Services-Agent
- Add Foundry IQ integration for agentic RAG
- Add multi-language support \(8 languages\)
- Create new Inter-Agency-Knowledge-Hub use case
- Add AI Evaluation Framework with Azure AI Evaluation and red teaming
- Add Microsoft Agent Framework patterns \(sequential, handoff\)
- Add NY State agency sample data \(DMV, DOL, OTDA, DOH, OGS\)
- Create GitHub Spec Kit templates for all use cases
- Update dependencies to 2025/2026 versions \(Semantic Kernel 1.45+\)
- Add HACKATHON_QUICKSTART.md for Day 1 setup
- Add .github/copilot-instructions.md with gov constraints

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add 6 AI hackathon use cases with full implementations and tests

Projects included:
- 001-Constituent-Services-Agent: Python chatbot for citizen services
- 002-Document-Eligibility-Agent: Document OCR and validation
- 003-Emergency-Response-Agent: Emergency response planning with Semantic Kernel
- 004-Policy-Compliance-Checker: Policy document compliance checking
- 005-Inter-Agency-Knowledge-Hub: Cross-agency document search
- 006-DotNet-Virtual-Citizen-Assistant: .NET 9 RAG chatbot with Azure AI Search

All projects include:
- Complete implementation with mock services for offline development
- Unit tests \(265 total tests passing\)
- E2E tests with Playwright \(Python\) and xUnit WebApplicationFactory \(.NET\)
- Feature specifications and implementation plans in /specs

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update documentation for all 6 accelerators

- Update main README with accurate test counts \(265 total\)
- Add 6th accelerator \(DotNet Virtual Citizen Assistant\) section
- Create READMEs for Document-Eligibility-Agent, Emergency-Response-Agent,
  Policy-Compliance-Checker, and Inter-Agency-Knowledge-Hub
- Update DotNet-Virtual-Citizen-Assistant README with badges and test count
- Rewrite QUICKSTART.md with current accelerator info and running instructions
- Fix test badge counts: CSA\(43\), DEA\(86\), ERA\(62\), PCC\(14\), IKH\(38\), VCA\(22\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
